header.name: Álvaro Mañoso Oca
header.quote: Full Stack Software Engineer living in Barcelona

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.body: I'm Álvaro and you're visiting my personal portfolio. Take a look and don't hesitate to contact me!

gft.name: GFT Group
gft.description: Development and management of software applications, in a microservices based architecture, following quality and efficiency standards. Working within an internacional development team backed by a Scrum project management strategy.

ithinkupc.name: IThinkUPC
ithinkupc.description: Development and management of software applications, mostly monolitic, following quality and efficiency standards. Working on the complete life cycle of these applications, from the gathering of requirements to their deployment and maintenance.

languages.title: Languages
languages.english-description: Excellent reading and listening comprehension and fluent speaking in professional and non-professional environments.
languages.french-description: Good reading and listening comprehension and basic speaking skills in non-profesional environments.

place.fib-upc: Facultat d'Informàtica de Barcelona (FIB), Universitat Politècnica de Catalunya (UPC)
place.fit-cvut: Fakulta informačních technologií (FIT), České vysoké učení technické v Praze (ČVUT)
